q: reading the article, I still do not know, because NEWSWEEK, in my opinion, renders quite an objective review of Donald Rumsfeld 's accomplishments and failings. For example, in the first category-accomplishments: He did succeed in having a major impact on transforming the John McCain military, and even now, some of his 2001 proposals to make the Pentagon more efficient are echoed by Donald Rumsfeld Robert Gates . At DoD, Donald Rumsfeld reorganized the command structure, established training for international peacekeepers, and revitalized Special Operations. As to his failings, Winik lists what we are all familiar with by now: the mangled occupation of Iraq( although Donald Rumsfeld liberally "delegates" that responsibility); the fact that he "didn't
